nodes.bodyText: Wouldn't it be better to refactor this assembler like the workbasket assembler and get rid of the old paging style?

Definitely.
But this is part of the follow up ticket, where we're going to refactor the aspect and not only fixing the bug.
Sadly this change is not related to the bug and was commited, because i cherry-picked the wrong commit.

won't fix!
Not part of the Bugfix.
Won't fix due to "import org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler;" dependency in "TaskanaRestExceptionHandler"
